name: glob
description: Fast file pattern matching tool. Returns list of file paths matching glob patterns like '**/*.rs' or 'src/**/*.ts'

path.description: Relative path to search within (optional, defaults to repo root)

max_results.description: Maximum number of files to return (default: 1000)

exclude.description: Paths or directory names to exclude (e.g., ['node_modules', 'target'])
